title: Update Whatever Request Schema
description: Fields in a request to update a single Whatever item.

name.title: name property schema
name.description: name of a Whatever item (e.g. "Change a light bulb")

dueDate.title: dueDate property schema
dueDate.description: date and optional time by which an item should be completed

done.title: done property schema
done.description: true if an item was completed, false otherwise
